trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type=reset>" name="<input type=reset>" href=""></xref> element on the server.

The HtmlInputReset class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that resets form controls to their initial values.
The HtmlInputReset control is often used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control, which is used to create a button control that submits the form.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputReset, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> class using default values.
The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The "reset" literal string.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> class using the specified input type.
The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The value of the `type` parameter.| Setting the `type` parameter to a value not recognized as a valid HTML `<input>` element results in a default HTML `<input>` element as a single-line text input field.
The input type.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> control is clicked.
The CausesValidation property is not intended to be used directly from your code.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> control is clicked on the Web page.
The ServerClick event is not intended to be used directly from your code.
To be added.
Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The ValidationGroup property is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
